1.title: Consultation & Needs Assessment
1.description: We gather information, analyze your industry, and recommend the most suitable account type for your advertising needs.

2.title: Account Setup & Permission Assignment
2.description: We set up the appropriate account, assign management permissions, and support you in launching campaigns.

3.title: Account Operation & Stable Spending
3.description: We monitor budgets, assist with performance control, and provide reporting throughout the ad campaign.

feature1.title: Google Ad Account System for Large-Scale Campaigns
feature1.description: We provide a Google ad account system capable of handling large-scale campaign deployment.
feature1.description2: Suitable for businesses, marketing teams, and agencies needing to run multiple campaigns simultaneously.
feature1.description3: Our support team accompanies you during setup and implementation, ensuring stable and effective ad delivery.

feature2.title: Invoice Account Solutions for Specialized Advertising
feature2.description: Invoice accounts are suitable for industries with high approval requirements or specialized content.
feature2.description2: We assist in proper campaign deployment, ensuring stable delivery and minimizing disruptions.
feature2.description3: This solution helps businesses optimize spending and reach customers more effectively during advertising.

adcore.heading: Campaign Implementation Support
